meanings.definition: A sea anemone with a cylindrical body and tentacles surrounding a central mouth.
meanings.sent1: The actinia swayed gently in the ocean currents.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful actinia while snorkeling in the reef.
meanings.sent3: The actinia seemed to be waving hello to the passing fish.
meanings.sent4: The actinia's tentacles danced gracefully in the water.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the actinia made it stand out among the rocks.

meanings.definition: The class of sea anemones to which the actinias belong.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the actinia to learn more about marine life.
meanings.sent2: The actinia is an interesting subject in biology class.
meanings.sent3: In the actinia family reunion, everyone brought a dish to share.
meanings.sent4: The actinia group is known for their unique characteristics.
meanings.sent5: Learning about the actinia group helps us understand ocean ecosystems better.
